item.title: CVE-2022-47512|2024-08-03T14:55:08.298Z -- solarwinds -- hybrid%20cloud%20observability%20%28hco%29%2F%20solarwinds%20platform
item.description: Sensitive information was stored in plain text in a file that is accessible by a user with a local account in Hybrid Cloud Observability (HCO)/ SolarWinds Platform 2022.4. No other versions are affected
